name: get_details_by_asn_number
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool asn_details.
Tool description: Get details about Autonomous System Numbers (ASN), find ASN of IPs/CIDRs, find ASNs of each country etc
API description: Fetch details related to a given Autonomous System Number (ASN) such as IP ranges, country, organization, and CIDR.

asn_number.description: The ASN number for which details need to be retrieved.
